text: Nguazir ia iniamin kamɨn mɨtaghniaba, da sautɨn amadaghan gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganim ikegh mangɨ, notɨn amadaghan Lebanonɨn kantrin mɨghsɨabar otogham. Egh mangɨ aruem anadi naghɨn Yufretisɨn Faner ekiamɨn otogh, mangɨ Hitian nguaziba bar ada inigham. Egh mangɨ aruem ghuaghiri naghɨn Mediterenianɨn Ongarir Ekiamɨn otogham.
